snippet: The international police organization issued a call Tuesday for help in arresting Tariq al-Hashimi, an Iraqi vice president, on terrorism charges, stepping into a bitter fight.
abstract: Interpol accepts Iraqi request for aid in arresting Tariq al-Hashimi, fugitive Sunni vice president who is being sought on terrorism charges; move is likely to add to tensions between Iraq's Shiite leadership and leaders in Turkey, where Hashimi has been staying under apparent government protection.

byline.contributor: Sebnem Arsu contributed reporting from Istanbul.

lead_paragraph: The international police organization issued a call Tuesday for help in arresting Tariq al-Hashimi, an Iraqi vice president, on terrorism charges, stepping into a bitter fight.

headline.main: Interpol Joins Effort to Find Iraq Official
headline.print_headline: Interpol Joins Effort To Find Iraq Official
